text: Leidys Oquendo (23 July 1982 — 6 October 2022) was a Cuban women's basketball player. She was a member of the Cuba women's national basketball team from 2006 to 2018.El fallecimiento de Leidys Oquendo enlutece al baloncesto cubano juventudrebelde.cu, 6 October 2022Baloncesto cubano de luto por el fallecimiento de Leidys Oquendo acn.cu, 6 October 2022Leidys Oquendo, basketball.latinbasket.com Oquendo became four times Centrobasket champion (2006, 2008, 2012 and 2014). She competed four times at the FIBA Women's AmeriCup. She became champion in 2013 and won the silver medal in 2015. She didn’t win a medal in 2011 and 2017. She was a member of the team at the 2007 and 2015 Pan American Games, winning a bronze medal. She competed at the FIBA Women's Basketball World Cup in 2006 and 2014. Oquendo died on 6 October 2022 at the age of 40 years. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cuban basketball players Category:sportswomen
title: Leidys Oquendo
